def_cn: （尤指修理汽车的）技工，机修工，修理工
def_en: A mechanic is someone whose job is to repair and maintain machines and engines, especially car engines.

def_cn: （过程、系统、动作等）运作方式;(具体的)方法，技巧
def_en: The mechanics of a process, system, or activity are the way in which it works or the way in which it is done.
Mechanics is the part of physics that deals with the natural forces that act on moving or stationary objects.
